pages.text: The Sculk Catalyst converts the dead into Sculk but it seems to devour the Soul Energies of the creature to convert them. With the use of the Soul Absorber, you are able to make the Catalyst absorb Soul Energy from the Cursed Cage and spread Sculk around it.
The Sculk Converter requires a Redstone Signal to absorb Soul Energy and spread Sculk.

The Sculk Converter can also be enchanted with Potency, which will cause it to absorb more Soul Energy and spread more Sculk. It appears your tinkering with this odd object causes it to stop spreading Sculk when a creature nearby dies.
